properties.name: camel.lra.coordinator-context-path
properties.description: The context path of the LRA coordinator service

properties.name: camel.lra.coordinator-url
properties.description: The base URL of the LRA coordinator service (e.g. http://lra-host:8080)

properties.name: camel.lra.enabled
properties.description: Global option to enable/disable component auto-configuration, default is true.

properties.name: camel.lra.local-participant-context-path
properties.description: The context path of the local participant callback services

properties.name: camel.lra.local-participant-url
properties.description: The local URL where the coordinator should send callbacks to (e.g. http://my-host-name:8080)
